name: Chicken and Sausage Jambalaya
instructions: Cook andouille sausage until brown; set aside.
In the same skillet, cook seasoned chicken thighs until lightly browned; remove and set aside.
Reduce heat to medium; saut√© bell peppers, onions, and celery (the holy trinity).
Add garlic, tomato paste, and crushed tomatoes.
Stir in rice, cooked sausage, and chicken.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 12 minutes.
Turn off heat and let the jambalaya fluff.
Garnish with green onions and serve hot.
